product_name: REI Merino Wool Crew Socks - Toddlers' - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The toddlers' REI midweight Merino Wool crew socks are ready for all their adventures big and small. Supersoft merino wool enhances moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort. Elastic arch braces hold socks in place and promote circulation. Soft padding underfoot cushions steps; padded insteps relieve pressure from laces. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The toddlers' REI midweight Merino Wool crew socks are ready for all their adventures big and small.
